MWC.Utilities.Timer

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.Utilities.Timer.Timer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Timer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Timer JavaBean is a nonvisual component that sends an ActionEvent to the registered TimerListeners every "delay" property milliseconds. It can either send that event only once, or it can cycle (according to the "onceOnly" property).
    Version:
    1.01, Sep 02, 1998
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
